name: Coconuts Software
description:
We are obsessed with making people's life more simple and funny across elegant and robust solutions, that we use to create delightful apps. We are a young group of entrepreneurs, innovative and passionate about our work, who happen to be experienced multidisciplinary creatives, developers and designers with shared vision for what we do and how we do it.
Together we have more than 30 years in the industry, we have worked with all sorts of companies from government, multinationals, startups, you name it. If you want to work with us, give us a yell, and discover how we can help you.
READ MORE...
